a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Wind energy generation is measured in terawatt-hours (TWh). Figures include both onshore and offshore wind
Data source: Energy Institute - Statistical Review of World Energy (2024)
Note: CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States) is an organization of ten post-Soviet republics in Eurasia following break-up of the Soviet
